short_summary: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME
full_summary:
---------------------------------------

### Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: Refurbishment of the Central Cooling Plant (CSA)
**Title in French**: Rénovation de la centrale de refroidissement (ASC)

#### Tender Details
----------------------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS4308727895-Doc4308794542
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4308727895
* **Publication Date**: November 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (eastern standard time)

#### Procurement Details
----------------------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: Building Construction Management
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Contracting Entity
----------------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**:
	+ Address Line 1: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ City: Gatineau
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada

#### Project Description
-----------------------------------------

This procurement pertains to the refurbishment of the Central Cooling Plant (CSA) located at 3701 Carling Ave, Building 65, Ottawa, ON K2K 2Y7. The successful bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the time of bid closing. Failure to comply with this requirement will render the bid non-compliant.

#### Mandatory Site Visit
----------------------------------------

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for November 29, 2023, at 9:00 AM. Interested bidders must provide their names and the name of the firm they represent to the Contracting Authority no later than November 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM. Any individuals attending the site visit without prior notification will be denied access.

#### Request for Information
----------------------------------------

All requests for information related to this tender must be submitted through the designated contact, Gillian Fenwick2, at least 5 working days prior to the tender closing date.

#### Contact Information
----------------------------------------

* **Contact Name**: Gillian Fenwick2
* **Contact Email**: [gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gillian.fenwick
